4689.quoteText:
You do not have to give your personal or legal name to create an npm
account.
You can use a pseudonym instead.
4689.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

4723.quoteText: npm does not respond to the Do Not Track HTTP header
4723.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

4724.quoteText: >Nothing in this Agreement gives npm any ownership rights in intellectual property that you share with npm Services, such as your Account information or any Packages you share with npm Services (Your Content).
4724.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

4725.quoteText: You decide whether and how to license it.
4725.title: Users are free to choose the type of copyright license that they want to use over their content

tosdr.case: Users are free to choose the type of copyright license that they want to use over their content

4726.quoteText:
>You will indemnify npm, its officers, directors, employees,
representatives, and agents, and hold them harmless for, all liability,
expenses, damages, and costs from any third-party claims, demands,
lawsuits, or other proceedings alleging that Your Content, your use
of npm Services, or both, violate the intellectual property right of
a third party, this Agreement, or applicable law.
4726.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

4747.quoteText: >You must be at least 13 years of age to use npm Services.
4747.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

4748.quoteText:
You will be responsible for all action taken using your account, whether
authorized by you or not, until you either close your account or give
npm notice that the security of your Account has been compromised.
You will notify npm immediately if you suspect the security of your
Account has been compromised.
You will select a secure password for your
Account.
You will keep your password secret.
4748.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

4749.quoteText: npm may restrict, suspend, or terminate your Account according to the Copyright Policy, if npm reasonably believes that you are in breach of these Terms, or if npm reasonably believes that you have misused npm Services.
4749.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

4750.quoteText:
Use of npm Services is at your sole risk.
npm Services are provided
on an "as is" and "as available" basis.
4750.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

4751.quoteText:
npm makes no warranty that npm Services will meet your requirements,
operate in an uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free manner
4751.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

4752.quoteText: or that errors in npm Services will be corrected.

You will be
solely responsible for any damage to your computer system and network,

Neither npm nor any third-party service provider used by npm to

4756.quoteText:
You will settle any Dispute as an
individual, and not as part of a class action or other representative
proceeding, whether as the plaintiff or a class member.
